name: A Whey To The Jam
description:
YOU CAN't OPEN YOUR JAM!

you need to get big and fast !

get the WHEY and the chicken to become the great jam opener

Beat up the terrible vegetable and nutritionist that tell you (read with an anoying voice )"don't eat only whey and chicken." 

maybe you'll become earth's only hope to defeat an evil space robot asteroid nutritionist 

and SAVE THE WORLD !

Controls:

- WASD: movement

- J / K: Hit

- Mouse right and left click: Hit
